General.Name: Hanstone Gold Corp
General.Description: Hanstone Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties. It holds interest in the Doc Property located in the Skeena Mining Division in northwest British Columbia. It also holds interest in the Snip North property located in British Columbia. Hanstone Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 777 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1S4
